name: Modular Wallet
description: 1. Self-custodial wallet with modular framework, built natively on the Arbitrum One chain, powered by the MOD token 2. First native wallet with a modular approach. A decentralized open-source app store. 3. Second time founders building and innovating on the most liquid L2 blockchain. Soon available on other chains like Avalanche 4. Building more modules leveraging on Arbitrum projects, and going L2 multichain in the short-term. 5. Utility token that boosts features and modules within the app.
